account_band.title: Want to make your contribution count? Create an account or sign in on Open Food Facts!

contribution_modal.title: Your contribution matters
contribution_modal.information: Hunger Games is an effort to leverage the results of our OCR. When you use Hunger Games by Open Food Facts, you improve our entire database which helps the community make better food choices. We gathers your annotations and use them to make Open Food Facts more accurate and effecient.
contribution_modal.thank_you: Thank you for helping us improve Open Food Facts so that more people can use it easily.

questions.label: etiket
questions.login_description: Currently you are not logged in Open Food Facts. To get your answers directly applied to products, and associated to your account, consider logging in to your Open Food Facts account, or creating one

logos.task_description: Select all logos that are exactly the same, and give them a name like "en:EU Organic" and a type like "label".
logos.label: Etiket

settings.reportIssue: Fundet en fejl? Fortæl os det venligst
settings.dev_mode_title: To explore the database content, activate the dev mode

page1.title: Welcome to Hunger Games
page1.text1: Hunger Games is a collection of mini-games that help contribute to Open Food Facts in many ways. You can play are really exciting games from anywhere. Here is a guided tour of the entire website which will get you started.
page1.text2: Make sure to login to the Open Food Facts website to get credit for your contributions. If you make a mistake, please take the time to correct it by heading to the website.
page1.text3: In case of any doubt about the games, click on the question mark icon at the top right of the page, and you can reach us on slack at the #hunger-games channel

page2.title: Questions Game
page2.text1: Does the food product belong to this brand?
page2.text2: Answer simply with a yes/no! Don't know the answer? That's alright, just skip it.
page2.text3: You can also use your keyboard keys o,n and k.
page2.text4: You can filter the products based on country, brands, popularity and much more!
page2.text5: If you don't want to do this every single time, you can also save the filters by clicking on the star. Next time you come back, find the saved filters on the home page itself

page3.title: Logos Game
page3.text1: Our another really loved game is the logos game where you have to select all the logos you feel are the same.
page3.text2: As shown in the example, once you select all the similar logos, just type their value and select where it is a brand, a label or something else. It's that simple!

page4.title: Eco-Score Questions Game
page4.text1: Help us finish the remaining questions in the most high priority labels!
page4.text2: These cards are linked to labels used in the computation of the eco-score.
page4.text4: Eco-Score captures the total environmental footprint, making it easier for consumers to compare products and decide which is better for the environment.

page5.title: Indstillinger
page5.text1: Set your preferred language, and report issues from our settings page.
page5.text2: If you're a developer, you can also explore our database content using our dev mode.

page6.title: Tour
page6.text1: Got stuck somewhere? Want to take the tour again?
page6.text2: Just click on the question mark and start the journey again!

page1.title: Udvælgelse
page1.text1: Vælg beskæringerne af det samme logo ved at klikke på dem
page1.text2: Valgte logoer placeres øverst på siden, og de kan fravælges ved igen at klikke på dem

page2.title: Advarsel
page2.text1: Indeholder beskæringen flere logoer, så vælg det ikke.
page2.text2: Indeholder beskæringen kun en del af et logo, kan det vælges

page3.title: Bekræftelse
page3.text2: Er det en etiket eller et mærkelogo, angiv hvilket det er

instructions.cropTheTable: Beskær billedet for at forenkle annotationen
instructions.verifyNutrimentDetected: Angiv, om det registrerede næringsstof er korrekt
instructions.selectMissingNutriments: Tilføj manglende næringsstoffer (der kan klikkes, selv hvis ordet intet felt har)

nutrition.value_missing: You forgot to input value duuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuude

nutriscore.label: Annotate nutriscore logo detection by batch.
nutriscore.description: To do so select all the images showing the correct/wrong nutriscore value ({{label}}), and click on the bottom buttons to say if you selected a set correct or wrong ones.
